alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 10 at 11:01PM CST until March 13 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM CST SATURDAY TO 4 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 13 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Bayfield and Ashland Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Red Cliff Band and the Bad River Reservation. * WHEN...From 3 PM CST Saturday to 4 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
